name: Joshua Hsu
bio: Hi there! I'm Joshua Hsu (he/him). Most people call me Josh. I'm an emerging software engineer with a demonstrated history in education and arts management, vision building, and design.
interests: I enjoy working on immersive and collaborative projects that spark creativity, curiosity, and conversation
location: I currently reside in Portland, ME with my wife, two children, and two dogs.
languages: I speak not only English but also Mandarin and Cantonese.
programming: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python, SQL, Typescript, EJS, DTL
frameworks: React, Express.js, Django, Jquery, Bootstrap, Mongoose
tools: Web, Application Architecture, Git, REST, JSON, NPM
